values: Hello minna-san!! *get bricked*...wait is there anyone here to even brick me? i feel like everyone had moved to tumblr, facebook or something, lol XD *still gets brick for being away from the fandom for too long =3=...* hmm...i don't really have a reason for why i've been gone, i mean, i literally DON'T HAVE A LIFE! T^T and i don't have school to busy me too, so all i can do is apologize! and let you know that i'm still kicken! Lately, i've been MIA, especially from the fandom, and it's not like i'm working hard on RL or something, its more like i've been being too lazy just watching drama and reading yaoi. And lately i've been questioning myself about the fandom...i'm not sure how to explain, i ran to fandom BECAUSE i wanted to run away from RL, but when i have no RL to run away from...you get me?? cause i don't get me... BUT! i've been trying to claim my love for JunDa again!! and i found it in an anime XD!! SAY HELLO TO "FREE!" i'm sure many of you had heard it, i mean it was so popular to the point that i was going to wait until it die down to actually give it a try (that's how i am, i don't like being apart of the trend, it annoys me =___=; ), but i decided and i fell in love with these two characters!! Makoto and Haruka!!~<3 (at first i like Haruka with Rin, but Makoto remind me SOOOO MUCH of Junno that i couldn't help loving him!!) don't they remind you of my favorite couple!!? don't they XD!!??? LOL! i know i'm crazy, but yeah i kinda photoshopped JunDa cosplaying as them...even crazier T^T! XD LOL! it's awful, right?? i know, but i really, REALLY wanted to make them! Oh well, i hope you enjoy! i also hope to be more active...i hope...will definitely reclaim my JunDa thrive!!

WAAAH! it feel like i haven't been in LJ for so long T^T!! how is everyone?? ANYWAYS~ since i'm half asleep, i'll just post up what this post was meant for!~ SORRY LJ buddies *evil* no LJ cut, fufufu *evil* so first up! i've been meaning to make this, but just couldn't find the good quality, but special thanks to for helping me find it T^T!! *loved*
I realized that one quality is better than the other and so i kinda had to blur it up to make it match, i'm sorry T^T! and as always, the messy played around version: i didn't like how it turned out T^T i definitely had no clue what i was doing T^T!! NEXT UP! THIS: sorry, no played around version for this cause my mind was blank when i was making it T^T! and last but not least~ (small thumb nail cause it's not THAT different from the played around version, LOL! and i THINK i preferred the played around version XD) well!~ that's all!~ i should be heading to bed soon T^T!!~ until maybe next month, i hope!

so because the awesome magazine was shared, i immediately saw these two images and they just clicked in my head! LOL T^T sadly...it wasn't JunDa WAAH!! BUT! TaNaka is just as loved! YAY!!~ XD though i apologize, it's not that good T^T i haven't touch Photoshop for a while now...hmm, been a couple of months, i assume?? or i'm just making excuses for my hideous manip BUT! i wanted to make this so bad!! so even though it's not good, i hope you get the idea of what i wanted!! XD!! here's the original manip:
sorry it's a bit dark T^T!! and as always, here's the version i played around with, LOL! Maru comes in and is surprise to see Koki, but as soon as lust hits, he watches as Koki undressed, LOL! XD i like the finish one a lot more than the original manip, lol XD i hope you enjoyed it too!!~
SORRY TANAKAMARU!! i've been pushing you two aside for a while now, ne?? T^T! i'm sooo sorry! i'll work hard on equaling my spreading of my OTPs LOVE!!...
i hope...
I REALLY! REALLY!! wanna do JunDa too, but sadly, their images didn't match T^T!! lets see what i can come up with...XD uh...and i don't really do this, but please PLEASE support KAT-TUN and buy their single!! it's maru's solo and maru is loved, right?? so please, PLEASE buy it and support them, ne?? ^^; i already bought all three, but i'm too poor to buy more T^T! AH! and i wanted to ask, have you guys seen Sushi Oji the movie with english subtitle?? i bought the DVD with eng sub for my sister a LONG while back, but i assumed that someone subbed it already so that's why i never uploaded it, but if you haven't seen it, please let me know and i'll consider uploading mine~ credits: as for the texture...i don't remember where i got it, it was around google a while back, so if it's yours, please let me know and i'll credit you!~

so first thing first

HAPPY BIRTHDAY NAKAMARU YUICHI!!~

sorry ;__; such boring font...=__= i honestly didn't have anything prepare for Maru's birthday T^T (actually i even, KINDA forgot about it, cause Maru's birthday is also the day school finally starts and summer ends!!~ so i guess you can say i purposely didn't wanna look at the calender... yep, it's late and i should really go to sleep, school DOES starts tomorrow) OKAY! enough of my complaining, lol!~ i kinda scanlated two TaNakamaru doujinshi that i own in preparation of Maru's birthday!~ first off, we have the first one, which i bought, A LONG time ago but because i lacked japanese, it was tough to translate (actually i still lack japanese!! lol) title: Okishii Kyoudai (Oxy Brothers) language: English/Japanese artist/writer:*K*A*N* (?) (i'm not sure) band(s)/artist(s) featured: KAT-TUN scanned/scanlated by: genre: comedy, romance, pairings featured: Akame and TaNakaMaru~ rating: PG-13 (because of mentions) any other notes: I don't promise that it'll be accurate because i'm not good with conversational japanese. More Akame than TanakaMaru but they're always there XD lol!~ and the ending is just perfect!!~ENJOY!! SPREAD THE Akame and TANAKAMARU RABU!!~ FYI: the RAW include the manga/fanfics/author notes, while the scanlated one only have the manga and untranslated author notes total of only 14 pages ~ RAW: MF English: MF title: Honey Honey Baby ~May I love you so much~ language: English artist/writer: nitoro@hasegawa band(s)/artist(s) featured: KAT-TUN scanned/scanlated by: genre: fluff, romance and small comedy pairings featured: TaNakaMaru and small, SMALL ninja Akame~ rating: R (because of a small scene) any other notes: AGAIN! may not be accurate ALSO~ there's two bubble that i couldn't translate no matter how much i researched T^T AH! and uke!Koki/seme!Maru, BUT! don't let that let that stop you from reading because this is about 38 pages of sweetness!! SERIOUSLY! this got to be one of my favorite doujin!! English: MF PLEASE DO NOT RESHARE! (i don't wanna get in trouble with any doujinka!) (but if you MUST, please ask first ^^) My english grammar is horrible and my translation may not be accurate <--warning ^^; BUT! my first time scanlating, so sorry if i suck at editing ^^; COMMENTS ARE LOVED!

copied and pasted from Good day. The Filipino people currently suffer from heavy rainfalls that has struck in the country. Here is the photo of what is really happening to the country. Right now, is holding a fundraising event to help the victims of these floods. All of the proceeds will go to the Philippine Red Cross for supplies (food, clothes, medicine, etc.). To help, you may write a fanfics, create graphics, translate, sub, etc. or you can buy these. For more details, you can click this link here. Take note that this is not only open to Filipino fans, foreign fans can also join. i have decided to contribute too! so please check out the post!~ mine is located here~

OMG!! so thanks to the amazing , i saw this image and it just tempted me SOOO MUCH to make this!! XD! i saw the image of Ueda a while back and loved it, but i wasn't sure how Junno looked like in the shooting, but when i saw it AND IN THAT POSITION! it was obvious what i had to do! LOL! they asked for it! when editor-san chose those images of JunDa, they really wanted me to make a manip *get bricked* LOL! so anyways, enough talk! ^^ here it is, the manip!~
sorry it's so messy, i try my best to make up the parts that were missing ;__; and also sorry for the small quality, but if it's too big, it'll look fake right? it already look fake snow! *get bricked* and here's the version i played around with~ it's really messy ;__; i know, lol! but still
LOL! i hope you enjoyed it! JunDa are too loved not to! ^3^ credits: /BNZTKJ as for the images for the background of the JunDa banner thingy, i DO NOT remember where i got it, around google a while back, so if it's yours, please let me know and i'll credit you!~

KONBANWA MINNA-SAN!~ <3 My first post since summer break started! XD! sorry for delaying it for...2 weeks? (then again, my last exam was just last thursday) but i've been trying to catch up on KAT-TUN dramas =w= (my excuse, of course), i finally finished watching Maru's Hayama-san to Yabareru and Last Money and Koki's Hissatsu Shigotonin SP 2010+2012 and is trying really REALLY hard to watch Ueda's Runaway, i mean Ueda is AMAZING IN IT! but it hurt too much to bear, i mean i cried my eyeballs out with epi 1, how's the rest gonna treat me? And i still don't feel motivated to watch Junno's Inu wo Kau to Iu Koto, family drama is always tough on me, but of course i'm loving Lagal High! XD!! with japanese drama, my top favorite genre is mystery, comedy and romance~ sorry =__= talk too much about dramas, lol! BUT! i'm not off topic yet! while watching Maru's Hayama-san to Yabereru/Last Money, i suddenly feel the urge to make a fanvid, BUT! sadly, Koki's scenes weren't enough!!! KOKI! PLEASE MAKE MORE DRAMAS!! and so this fanvid was made, with unmatched scenes but it was the best i could come up with (with such little WRONG scenes that was given to me ;__;) ANYWAYS!~ To all TaNakaMaru lovers (including myself, lol) PLEASE ENJOY!! <3
TaNaka FanMade- The Way Back A FanMade to Koki and Maru... okay, this is TOTALLY PURE FANMADE!! NOTHING BELONG TO ME, not the JE boys, not even the song, oh and it's yaoi (boyxboy), so to those who are not into those stuffs, I suggest that you should turn back! ^o^ i don't want to offend anyone!! This was made since i was tempted to make it! I apologize for the mismatched scenes, since SOMEONE didn't have that much scenes =__= but i hope the story is still understandable! so... WARNING: mismatched scenes STORYLINE (just in case you're confuse): Maru try his hardest to land a job, but no matter what, he's always get rejection letters making him start to lose hope in himself. One day while waiting for an interview, he somehow gets transported to the past where he meets Koki. The first encounter left Maru speechless, but he was determine to meet Koki again, and fortunately he does. Koki was able to help Maru find the hope that he had lost, but this also awoken hidden feelings. However, Maru is from the present and Koki, the past, will they be able to be together?...LOL! lame summary, but if you're confuse, let me know! ^^ comment are always LOVED!! as for the lyric, i don't remember where i got it from, so if it's yours, please let me know so that i can credit properly! so...how was it? *get bricked* i know, i know, the mismatched scene totally ruin the whole fanvid, but i really was determined to use Koki's "newer" dramas, since i'm always using Tokkyu Tanaka San Go ;__; sorry if it's bad, but i had to use the resources that was provided, lol! *get bricked anyways* I really like this song! and i was so surprise how much it matched the video, usually i make sure the video match the song, but toward the middle, i ran out of scenes/idea so i just kinda collided scenes together and i was still surprise that it kinda matched the song, lol! As much as i dislike youtube for muting/disabling my videos, it's the only steaming site that i know that work properly, but if you know one, please let me know ^^ THANK YOU FOR WATCHING!! and reading IF you did read, lol

... I had no clue when i first started this that it was going to take me so damn long to finish! i'm such an idiot to keep wanting to try new thing and this time, the new thing is (of course you already know if you read my previous valentine post) inking a doujin by hand! ;^; i LOVE the idea, it was the actually doing it that killed me a little... when i draw on the computer i can easily edit my mistake, but damn, inking by hand really kills, lol!~ either way, i hope you enjoy it!~ I wanna thank my sister for buying me the black copic marker that i used to ink XD! and my other sister for putting up with my all-nighters and also ~ i saw the JunDa wallpaper on your page and that was how the whole fangirling idea started XD!! so thank you! and also all my JunDa fangirls! YOU GUYS WILL FOREVER BE THE BEST!!~ enough chat~ Title: To be Like You Author/Artist: snow_guardian Pairing: JunDa Genre: Doujinshi, FLUFF Rating: G A.N: This was suppose to be for Valentine, but obviously, i'm a week late ;0; anyways, this is more bromance than romance XD! Either way, i hope you still like it!~ WARNING: THIS IS THE FIRST DOUJIN THAT I EVER INKED BY HAND! so it's horrible inking X/ with lots of mistakes, but really, i hope my horrible inking don't distract you from the story, AH! and it wasn't all done by hand, the lettering/toning and small editing were done by photoshop ^^ OH! and i can't draw short hair T^T! sorry Uepi! i mess him up so much! but i hope it's still okay... i hope... oh yeah and i also try not to use that much tone cause i'm always abusing the tone, lol!~s ANYWAYS! a total of 10 pages =CLICK IMAGES TO SEE IT BIGGER= so...how was it?? *gets bricked* once more, i know T__T the inking sucked, right? i'm sorry, but like i said, first time doing this much pages XD *gets bricked* anyways, compare to my previous doujins (ex: here) which way do you prefer me to ink in?? PLEASE FILL OUT THE POLL! LOL! XD!~

okay, first off, i wanna wish you all a

HAPPY NEW YEAR!! YAY FOR 2012!!~

(though it's bad too, cause 12 is the only number that i can't pronounce right T^T damn my accent!) i'm actually on break right now (well, two week left then second semester starts T^T) but i haven't been online at all! =__= i've been trying to be active this break *sadly fail* and my computer got attacked by a virus that i had to reboot the whole thing (so my HD is pretty much empty now ;__;) so these are the reasons why i haven't been a good fangirl =__= for those who are awaiting my fic...uh..writer block? *get killed* ANYWAYS! how's everyone?? how's the holidays! ^^ i hope you all are enjoying them!!~ i can't believe it's already 2012! i'm happy for KAT-TUN album too XD!!~ i fail my 2011 resolution so i hope to fulfill them this year! ^^ ANYWAYS!! enough of my talking~ (i really miss ya all!!~) onto the art trade that i owe people! CLICK ON IMAGE TO SEE BIGGER~ This was an art trade with T^T sorry it took me so DAMN LONG! and it just look like this!! i'm sorry for the crappy work! i really wanted to try hard on this one (and it did took me a long while) but i was never really good with colors and so it turn out really dark and moody and...ugly *bow!* =__= and i'm so sorry for the horrible background/chair! *never was good with background* but... i still hope you like it *hides* i know you've been busy too, but i hope to see you artwork soon ^^ AH! just in case, the request was base after Koki's J-Web, how he's the lord and ueda's his concubine, lol!~ i wanted to draw a more feminine Ueda, but i didn't want to get rid of his masculine side too, so i did a little of both and ended up... with that...^^; i really hope it's okay, i'm sorry once more ! i wasn't sure to base it on japanese clothings or chinese clothings, but since i've been watching a lot of chinese action movies, that kinda won ^^;
And this is an art trade with , her request was to draw a ShigeMaru no Ai situation, my version...and this is what i came up with *fail* i hope it's okay ^^; i try to stick to bunny-chan's orignal style of drawing by hand, but as you can see, my hand drawing is SO HORRIBLE! and i'm so sorry about my handwritings too! if it's too messy for you to read, please let me know and i'll type it down *fail* bunny-chan! i finish my end of the bargain ^^ now it's your turn!~ sent some JunDa rabu my way!!~ ^^ AH! and if you dunno who's who, it's shige, maru, then tegoshi and the last person to show up is koyama ^^; took the whole animal idea from bunny-chan, lol!~ i call this ShigeMaru no Ai SPECIAL!~ ^^
THANK YOU SO MUCH YOU BOTH FOR DOING AN ART TRADE WITH ME!! ^^ Of course, the new year can't just have these two artworks alone!~ where's my TaNaka and JunDa, NE!~ XD!~ so here's two more just for me and my TaNaka/JunDa buddies!~ ^^ TaNaka!~ I've been meaning to finish this up! this is base after this picture of TaNaka and when i saw this picture, i knew i had to draw it! XD! instrument is always so hawt!! XD! but sorry for the failure instrument though T^T i can't draw anything other than "wanna-be" manga people T^T...
and last but not least, JUNDA XD!!~ i drew this because...lol, i just wanted to XD!~ i don't think it's rated R or anything, i mean they're not even fully naked, but the position and bad words, so not work safe(?)...yeah i had to cover it =w= warning (that i forgot to add to image): Uke!Junno and Seme!Ueda XP~ CLICK ONLY IF!~
OKAY! that's all for my first post of 2012! for this year, i hope to spread more JunDa rabu!!~ XD!!~ *bow* thank you for taking your time to view my post (and i hope to those who were force to see this cause i save you as a friend and i don't like LJ-cut much, enjoyed this too, lol). THANK YOU!!~

Hello minna-san!~ i live! ...i think, i still have one more midterm to go and then MIDTERM SHOULD BE OVER AND I SHOULD HAVE TIME TO SHOW UP HERE MORE OFTEN!!!~ YAH! XD!!~ and of course, catch up on the fandom >__< i really had no plan for koki's birthday and as i was making this, i totally felt like giving up many time cause i was using a new movie maker program which required me to convert all the video i wanted to use (and THAT WAS A LONG TIME T^T!!~) and then when i finally got down to editing, i couldn't find the right scenes T^T!~ so i'm sooo sorry if it's mess up!~ (you can totally tell that i rushed through this) but of well...

HAPPY BELATED BIRTHDAY KOKI!!

though this vid is definitely NOT A HAPPY gift T^T sorry!! and i'm so late! sorry anways, enough talk~
TaNaka FanMade- Your Very Existence A FanMade to Koki and Maru... okay, this is TOTALLY PURE FANMADE!! NOTHING BELONG TO ME, not the JE boys, not even the song, oh and it's yaoi (boyxboy), so to those who are not into those stuffs, I suggest that you should turn back! ^o^ i don't want to offend anyone!! something i made quickly for Koki's birthday, i'm so sorry if it doesn't make sense or if some scene just didn't match, i made this quickly cause i was already late on Koki's birthday and i had no clue what to do, and so this popped up ^^; WARNING: character death/ angst ALERT! STORYLINE (cause i know you'll be confused): Maru and Koki are dating, but out of the blue, Maru breaks up with Koki, throughout the video, Koki remembers their memories together and he wonder why Maru broke up with him, it wasn't until the end that the truth came out... (of course if you're confuse about the ending, please just ask ^^;) Comment are always LOVED! ^^ Lyrics credits goes to kiwi-musume.com
i'm so sorry that i made it the way it is, i blame Maru for being a special guest in Hanchou 3! =3= i cried big time on his episode! again, i'm sorry about the mess up scenes, i rushed through this (and of course i should be studying for my midterm =v=;), anyways, i should get to sleep now =3= good night!~ <3<3

i'm seriously AM A BAD FAN!! officially!! T^T i wouldn't even know that it's Uepi's birthday if i didn't procrastinate and come here T^T!! sorry i didn't have anything to present for Uepi's lovely birthday, *sniff* and i can't do any last minute thing either (i have my japanese exam tomorrow T^T) so i'm just going to leave you guys with the arts that i've been working on so far for the ART TRADE ANYWAYS!~

HAPPY BIRTHDAY UEPI!!!

i'm so sorry, i can't even put a picture of you nor make your name sparkling, cause i dunno how T^T anyways, onto the art trade, i'm not done yet cause i still owe two people their arts, but i'll try to work on them this weekend (i hope, sorry it's taking so long!! T^T [2x] JunDa [1x] JinNo [1x] KameNo [1x] KAT-TUN [1x] TaNaka So this is in the order that i received ^^ =CLICK TO SEE BIGGER= To , she requested a JinNo image with Jin putting a scarf on Junno, sorry Junnie, it didn't turn out like i wanted it to T^T! i'm sorry for disappointing you! T^T but i really hope you like it, sorry it took so long!! T^T! i really did finish it for a while now, but i just never posted it up T^T!
To i had fun drawing this ^^ she requested chibi KAT-TUN (w/ Jin) with a piss off girl in the background, i wasn't sure how you wanted the girl to look like, so i just randomly drew "her" LOL sorry ^^ IT'S KAT-TUN A KIGURUMI PAJAMAS!~ ^^ i hope you can tell who's who, they're in order, hehehe
To OF COURSE JUNDA!! GYAAAH!!! i love them too XD!!~ she requested fluffy JunDa, but i'm not sure if this is fluffy enough ^^; i hope you like it~ hehehe, sorry it took so long when you already finish my art trade for so long!~ SORRY!! T^T!!
To hehehehe, she requested JunDa too XD!~ chibi JunDa at the beach, i wasn't sure what to draw, but i hope you like it!~ i LOVE drawing JunDa *cough*definitely bias here*get bricked*
To she requested KameNo hugging, i'm so sorry it turn out so bad T^T!! i wanted to show Junno's face, but i couldn't draw it! i totally suck at drawing hugging! T^T!!
and last but not least to who requested TaNaka Birthday plot~ i actually drew a different picture, but i didn't like it at all after i finished inking it, so when i heard from my kohai that Maru chose Koki's gift which was a collar and chocolate...uh, this naughty picture came into mind *blushes* sorry aoi-chan, i turned a fluffy birthday bad *get kicked for being dirty*
SORRY !! i finished sketching your request, but i haven't had time to ink/color it T^T! sorry, it's going to take a while, T^T!! i hope to finish it soon... i hope T^T ...AND ^^ i hope you come up with an idea soon (though i'm not rushing you AT ALL! cause i dunno if i'll be able to work on it) ANYWAYS! SORRY AGAIN FOR BEING SO LATE!! AND HAPPY BIRTHDAY UEDA!! so sorry i couldn't do anything!! T^T!! now to study my butt off for the exam of course, after advertising this post, fufufuf *edited* I SHOULD MAKE IT OFFICIAL TOO ^^; i'm going on hiatus, if it isn't clear yet, i'll try to come back every now and then, but let see how it goes T^T! i'm going to miss the fandom so much!! T^T!!

Okay XD~ so cause i made the TaNaka banner thingy, i decided to make 1 for JunDa too! teehee, i ended up just playing around though =3=... ANYWAYS!~ i also wanted to take this opportunity to talk about the RFY PV and see if you guys thought the same way i did, LOL!~ I know we all already seen it and it's kinda "old" news now (wait, it was just 2 days,is that really 'old'?), but i still have a thought about it and am still flailing over it, i seriously LOVE this PV and i think the thought into making it is incredible too, it's like KAT-TUN are lock in a room that prevent them from being able to move on. Maru's heart seem to be frozen in time, that's why nothing in his room was moving, while Koki can't go pass those thread, almost saying that something is holding him back. Junno's heart is obviously cold, no matter how much he try to call out and hold himself, there's no warmth. I was a bit confuse with Kame and Ueda, but i think Ueda's problem MIGHT be that he can't hear, that's why there's so many equiment, trying to be able to find something that he could hear. As for Kame, his visual, he can't see beyond those images, BUT! i dunno, this is just my thought of it, hahaha what was yours?? OKAY!~ enough blabbering about nothing ^^ lets get to the graphics!~ [2x] JunDa [1x] TaNaka [1x] KameNo (?) [1x] KAT-TUN so of course, this post was inspired by this banner of TaNaka ^^;: =CLICK TO SEE FULL SIZE= JUNDA TaNaka KameNo i don't usually make any other pair except for my OTPs but this was requested ^^; these were screencap/made by me ^^; (that's why it turn out horrible like this, LOL!~) KAT-TUN this turn out badly =_= i was just playing with this one, so please don't take this one seriously *fail at photoshopping* Credit for the scan: ANYWAYS. that's all T^T sorry it's so small, but i hope you liked them!!~ SPREAD THE JUNDA RABU!~ (along with TaNaka) and please credit if used Thank you for dropping by XD!!~

only two to share, cause i'm a super slow photoshop toucher =__+ [1] TaNaka White Wallpaper [1] TaNaka RFY layout banner(?) i made this when "white" came out, but i totally forgot to share! (why am i always like that OMG! sorry it's so plain, but i couldn't get it right, LOL!~ this one i couldn't help but make after seeing the PV, LOL!~ sorry it's so angst-ish PLEASE CREDIT IF USED!! T^T

After four days on working on this...meme(?) I FINALLY FINISH! XD! i never thought it be so hard to TRACE...(well it wasn't really tracing but it was kinda like that) and making it KAT-TUN/ARASHI/NEWS is even harder T^T i'm so sorry that Tegomass came out...mess up cause no matter how much i erase and drew, i couldn't make it right (also i had to "add" tegoshi cause there was only 15 characters in the original Durarara! pic and i need 16!) hahaha anyways, sorry for the messy work and if it doesn't look like them =v= anyways!~ enjoy~ The original meme thingy could be find HERE Click on the image to see it bigger they are drawn in the order of my most favorite in the groups EXCEPT NEWS! =v= Ryo is suppose to be first, but since i couldn't add him in the hugging part, i made koyashige go first, hahaha!~ OR watch it XD!~ i mixed the song together!!~ KAT-TUN outfit was from REAL FACE, Arashi's from Truth and NEWS from Taiyou no Namida~ MY FAVORITE PVs!!~ =Or watch it HERE= if it doesn't work sorry again for the messy works =__= it's my first time drawing Arashi and News (other than Koyashige) and so i'm sorry if they didn't come out right!!~ as always i mess up on Kame T^T he's too beautiful for me to draw... AH! and i apologize if the body size is out of proportion, like i said, i kinda trace it from the original which include girls so yeah *look away* sorry sho and ueda.. and Maru and Massu, you guys turn out too squishy or too stretched T^T... ANYWAYS!!~ comments are love!!~

Title: The Thread of Fate Author/Artist: snow_guardian Pairing: TaNakaMaru Genre: Doujinshi, romance, DRABBLE Rating: PG A.N: this is for 's birthday! T^T i hope i'm not late~ it's a TaNaka doujin that i got sketched up a while back, but it wasn't until i received a special request from aoi-chan that i decide to draw it out =v=; *bow* I'm sorry for the horrible drawing! i rushed it a bit cause i wanted to reach your birthday...but i'm a bit late T^T WARNING: BIG abuse of tone... I RUIN KOKI'S NEW HAIR T^T! and really messy =_= no cover T^T didn't have enough time this was base after TaNaka's newest look T^T but i couldn't draw Koki's hair right! i love his hair so much, yet at the same time, it took me soooooo long to draw it!!
